data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_b4a5e537894bdc00787e80e4d3ada5dd.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
When holding down the <font color="a6aafb">Basic Attack</font> button, Benedetta enters the Swordout state and charges up Sword Intent. If the <font color="a6aafb">Basic Attack</font> button is released after the Sword Intent is fully charged, Benedetta will use Swordout Slash in <font color="a6aafb">the direction she's facing</font> and dash forward, dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+215% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies on the path (counts as Skill Damage and is reduced to 50% on Minions and Creeps).

Benedetta can only use Swordout Slash when her Sword Intent is fully charged and she is in Swordout state by holding down the <font color="a6aafb">Basic Attack</font> button.

Benedetta also gains Sword Intent by dealing damage with her Basic Attacks and skills.

Benedetta withdraws swiftly and leaves a shadow in front. After a short delay, her shadow slashes forward in a fan-shaped area, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+75% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing the enemies by 60% for 0.5s.

Meanwhile, Benedetta dashes forward to slash, dealing 75<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. (If the target is hit by her shadow, damage caused by Benedetta herself will increase to 200%.)

Benedetta raises her weapon to defend, gaining Control Immunity and blocking damage from any source for 0.8s. After this, she stabs in the designated direction, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

If Benedetta successfully fends off any damage while defending, she will gain full <font color="a6aafb">Sword Intent</font>. If she fends off any control effects, her subsequent stab stuns the target for 1.5s.

Benedetta clenches Alecto, dashes forward (Benedetta is untargetable during the dash), and performs a slash after a short delay, detonating the Sword Intent along the path. For 2.5s, the Sword Intent deals up to a total of 1560<font color="fba51f"> (+1105% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies within and slows them by 50%.

data.name: Benedetta

__data.skilldesc: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num2> [C1Magic Damage] to nearby enemies, [C2petrify] them for <Num1>s, and slow them by <%Num3> for <Num4>s afterward.
__data.skilldescemblem: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Powerful burst and Lifesteal. Great for finishing enemies.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+10% Spell Vamp
+22 Adaptive Attack
+6 Extra Physical Defense
+6 Extra Magic Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional <%Num2> Spell Vamp, up to <Num3> stacks.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover <%Num1> of Lost HP and gain <%Num2> Movement Speed.########[8098ab]Duration: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskill2: Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+60 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+5% Movement Speed
+5 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equiptips:
+160 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskill2: Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+10% Spell Vamp

recommendmasterplan.name: The Prestige Moji
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Female warrior defending the Barren Lands against demon invasion.

assist.desc: Benedetta works well with strong CC initiators, like Johnson and Gatotkaca, because they allow her to maximize the effects of her Ultimate.

strong.desc: Benedetta's 2nd Skill can effectively block enemy CC, making her a great counter to heroes with predictable CC skills, such as Jawhead and Guinevere.

weak.desc: Benedetta is countered by heroes with skills that shutdown mobility skills, such as Minsitthar and Phoveus, since all of Benedetta's skills are considered mobility.
